title: Thoughts on Aatrox rework?

embed.description: RECENT NEWS: 7.4 Patch Notes / Client Beta Update #2: Replacing the Legacy Client / Meddler Quick Gameplay Thoughts, 2/22 / Surrender at 15 Testing in OCE] The PBE has been updated! As we kick of the 7.5 PBE cycle, tonight's update includes [ A LOT OF STUFF] Continue reading for more information!

body: Interesting to say the least, no more health costs and missing-health type healing, passive looks promising.....thoughts Aatrox mains?

replies.body: I'm pretty excited of the changes. This solves some of his short comings. As trashy lv 7 Aatrox main I welcome these changes and hopefully riot gives us more fixes with Aatrox :D
not really a rework , but it looks good none the less.
His passive is stated as a rework and his abilities have been heavily adjusted, I would say its a mini rework
did say yesterday he was going to get a minirework soon before they finally touch him good in 2018.

partial rework , they only changed the one mechanic, but yeah i reckon his passive is going to be freaking huge, especially in terms of early game trading.

regardless im more exicted about this than christmas
Wasn't he meant to get a rework during the tank update? or was it divers?

> [{quoted}](name=StealthVortex88,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=uzOGvjau,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-02-23T06:13:42.138+0000)
>
> Wasn't he meant to get a rework during the tank update? or was it divers?

Divers.

But that's not coming up any time soon, it's scheduled for 2018 or something I heard.

This is probably just some tweaks to get by for him before he gets to the class rework. Idk.
